snippet: The passenger in Walter Scott’s car, Pierre Fulton, spoke out for the first time through his lawyer, saying he did not see the shooting but heard a Taser and shots fired.
abstract: Jean Hoefer Toal, chief justice of South Carolina's Supreme Court, appoints Judge Clifton B Newman to oversee murder case against police officer Michael T Slager; departs from standard procedure by appointing judge from outside town of North Charleston, and by granting him jurisdiction over case regardless of where he is assigned to hold court.
lead_paragraph: The passenger in Walter Scott’s car, Pierre Fulton, spoke out for the first time through his lawyer, saying he did not see the shooting but heard a Taser and shots fired.

headline.main: Outside Judge Is Named for Police Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Outside Judge Is Named for Police Shooting Case
